content: --- title: Tows Data Model description: published: true date: 2024-09-05T11:24:41.777Z tags: editor: markdown dateCreated: 2024-09-05T10:37:37.599Z --- # Tows Data Model | Attribute | Type | Description | | :---------------- | :--------: | :------------------------------------------------- | | towId | `'string'` | Unique identifier of tow machine | | regId | `'string'` | Registration id of assigned aircraft | | rampId | `'string'` | Ramp identifier | | startLat | `'string'` | Latitude of start position | | startLong | `'string'` | Longtitude of start position | | endLat | `'string'` | Latitude of end position | | endLong | `'string'` | Longtitude of end position | | status | `'string'` | Status of the towing activity. S = Scheduled, A = Active, F = Finished, C = Cancelled | | startTime | `'datetime'` | Start date and time of the assignment in UTC | | endTime | `'datetime'` | End date and time of the assignment in UTC | | extraInfo | `'string'` | Extra information |
